item.title: Pesto Risotto
item.description: Difficulty: easy Time: 20 minutes Ingredients (4 people): Arborio Risotto rice (250g) Artichoke (1) Mushrooms (200g) Mascarpone (125g) Garlic (couple of cloves) Parsley Hard Cheese Olive oil Salt and Pepper White Wine Venegar Pesto: Basil (150g) Hard Cheese (150g) Olive oil Pine nuts (100g) Instructions: Pesto Blend the ingredients together until smooth.
